data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 2, Kashiwa's Yuta Kamiya breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 4, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sendai throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 5, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Alexandre Guedes (Sendai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 12, In Kashiwa, Sendai push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 20, Hayato Nakama puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Ataru Esaka with an assist there.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Sendai's Shogo Nakahara is on target but unsuccessful.
Important block from the Sendai defence as Ataru Esaka fires in a strike for Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Sendai's Takahiro Yanagi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Throw-in for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
In the minute 36, Yuta Kamiya is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Yuta Kamiya is back on his feet again.
In the minute 38, Yusuke Segawa (Kashiwa) has replaced the possibly injured Yuta Kamiya at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Michael Olunga heads in to give Kashiwa a 2-0 lead at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 40, Yusuke Segawa instrumental with a fine assist.
Michael Olunga of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Hidekazu Otani of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Sendai's half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Koji Hachisuka with Takayoshi Ishihara.
Takashi Kiyama is making the team's second substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Takuma Nishimura replacing Ryo Germain.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Takuma Nishimura keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 48, Great play from Shuhei Akasaki to set up the goal.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 53, Sendai's Shuhei Akasaki misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 55, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Sendai are pushing forward but Alexandre Guedes's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Goal! Michael Olunga extends Kashiwa's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 58, That's a fine assist from Ataru Esaka.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa have been given a penalty at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium...
In the minute 61, A massive blow for Kashiwa as Michael Olunga misses from the spot.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Sendai surge into the attack at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium but Shuhei Akasaki’s header is off-target.
In the minute 63, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Shogo Nakahara with Kunimitsu Sekiguchi. This is the third substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 66, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Kashiwa's area.
Shun Nagasawa is replacing Ryohei Michibuchi for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 68, Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 71, Kashiwa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kyohei Yoshino (Sendai) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 73, It's now 4-1 in Kashiwa as Michael Olunga scores for Kashiwa.
That's a fine assist from Masatoshi Mihara.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 76, Hidekazu Otani (Kashiwa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Sendai are coming forward and Shun Nagasawa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a fifth substitution, with Yasuhiro Hiraoka replacing Shuhei Akasaki.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 80, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 83, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Kashiwa make their second substitution with Sachiro Toshima replacing Hayato Nakama.
Goal! Kashiwa extend their lead to 5-1 through Yusuke Segawa.
In the minute 86, Sachiro Toshima with an assist there.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Naoki Kawaguchi is replacing Taiyo Koga for the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Sendai at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Kashiwa.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Full-time! The final score is 5-1.
